meanings.sent1: She was buttering her toast for breakfast.

meanings.definition: The act of applying butter to something.
meanings.sent1: The buttering of the bread made it more delicious.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the buttering on the muffins at the bakery.
meanings.sent3: The buttering on the door handle made it hard to open.
